title: Singam Dance Lyrics SIngam 2 Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Singam Dance
Singer: DSP, Baba Sehgal
Movie: Singam 2
Lyrics: Viveka
Music: Devi Sri Prasad		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Yo, this is the chance
lets do singam dance
every body put'ur handsup and say
welcome to valantine's day
.. and pump up the beat
on the floor and say repeat

every body put'ur handsup and say
welcome to valantine's day
this is the day for romance baby so
lets sing and dance
its singam dance

Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday
Thursday, Friday, Saturday

ettaam naalaai weekly weekly
venum oru Valantine's day
ye kadhal ennaku muthikichu muthikichu
happy BP thothikichu thothikichu
l-o-v-e ezhuthukulla ellaam irukiradhe

lets sing and dance
its singam dance (2)
lets sing and dance

Summer, Winter, Spring and Automn
ovvoru naatilum change aagum
kadhal pookum season mattum
ellaa oorilum ondraagum

Ye ice-um ice-um ottikichu ottikichu
ada heart-um heart-um muttkichu muttikichu
azhage unnai thaedi vandhen
i love u sollu - i love you

lets sing and dance
its singam dance (2)
lets sing and dance

every body put'ur handsup and say
welcome to valantine's day
.. and pump up the beat
on the floor and say repeatEnglish Translation
